name: fumo
description:
There are no immortals in this world, but since ancient times, human beings have seen the world around them, and all kinds of strange things, such as lightning, thunder, storms, natural disasters and man-made disasters, and countless casualties. The vast expanses of sorrow and sorrow can never be overcome by human beings. So he thought that there were all kinds of gods above the nine heavens, and that under the nine ghosts, there was also the place where the ghosts returned, the Hall of Hell. Therefore, the theory of immortals was handed down in the world. Countless people of mankind sincerely worship and worship various gods created by their imagination, praying for good and complaining, and the incense fire is flourishing

In today's world, the right path is Dachang, and evil spirits retreat. The Central Plains is a land of beautiful mountains and waters, full of popularity and rich resources, which is firmly occupied by decent schools.

This story begins with "you".

In the game, you will play the role of the disciple of Sanqing Palace, follow the teacher's order to go to the Demon Subduing Cave to fight the Sword Protecting God and retrieve the Demon Subduing Sword. On the way down the mountain to kill the demon, I made friends in Forget Worry Village and killed the snake demon with my friends. Later, he ran into a mysterious woman in Jianye City. The three of them walked in the Jianghu together. During the process of killing demons, they gradually found a big secret. How will you choose? Can they finally save the world? The Jianghu of Demon Subduing Record will be continued by you.

Classic RPG games experience round combat mode to experience rich plots.
